name: atom-no-tab-close-button

1.0.0.name: atom-no-tab-close-button
1.0.0.description: Removes the close buttons from tabs (you can still close tabs with CMD+W or by clicking tab with Mouse3 button)

readme:
# No Tab Close Button

Removes the close buttons from tabs (you can still close tabs with CMD+W or by clicking tab with Mouse3 button)

metadata.name: atom-no-tab-close-button
metadata.description: Removes the close buttons from tabs (you can still close tabs with CMD+W or by clicking tab with Mouse3 button)
